description: Data was extracted from the TCGA DCC on February 2017 for somatic mutation calls with each mutation call was annotated using Oncotator.

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089  --  note that each case typically has a primary-tumor sample and a matched-normal (blood or adjacent tissue) sample; please refer to the TCGA Biospecimen table for more details
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: sample_barcode_tumor

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: sample_barcode_normal

fields.description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
fields.name: aliquot_barcode_tumor

fields.description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
fields.name: aliquot_barcode_normal

fields.description: The reference genome used for the alignment (GRCh37)
fields.name: NCBI_Build

fields.description: UniProt ID
fields.name: HGNC_UniProt_ID_Supplied_By_UniProt

fields.description: Entrez gene ID (an integer). 0 is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene region or Ensembl ID
fields.name: Entrez_Gene_Id

fields.description: Translational effect of variant allele
fields.name: Variant_Classification

fields.description: Type of mutation. TNP (tri-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to DNP (di-nucleotide polymorphism) but for three consecutive nucleotides. ONP (oligo-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to TNP but for consecutive runs of four or more (SNP, DNP, TNP, ONP, INS, DEL, or Consolidated)
fields.name: Variant_Type

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX
fields.name: Chromosome

fields.description: Lowest numeric position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence. Mutation start coordinate
fields.name: Start_Position

fields.description: End position, in 1-based integer coordinates
fields.name: End_Position

fields.description: An assessment of the mutation as somatic, germline, LOH, post transcriptional modification, unknown, or none. The values allowed in this field are constrained by the value in the Validation_Status field
fields.name: Mutation_Status

fields.description: Location and Base Genome Change
fields.name: Genome_Change

fields.description: CDNA change. Examples: c.3236G>A,c.143_147delCTGCC, c.4417_4418insCAA
fields.name: cDNA_Change

fields.description: Changes an amino acid to another amino acid e.g. p.G464V
fields.name: Protein_Change

fields.description: Ensembl Annotation Transcript ID (e.g. ENST00000366560.3)
fields.name: Annotation_Transcript

fields.description: Total number of mutations in genes in CCLE Oncomap data
fields.name: CCLE_ONCOMAP_Total_Mutations_In_Gene

fields.description: One or more genome sequencing center reporting the variant
fields.name: Center

fields.description: Total Alteration in Gene
fields.name: COSMIC_Total_Alterations_In_Gene

fields.description: dbSNP reference SNP number, eg rs121913500 -- may be a comma-delimited list, or may be null
fields.name: DbSNP_RS

fields.description: DbSNP validation status is reported as a semicolon-separated list of statuses. The union of all rs-IDs is taken when there are multiple
fields.name: DbSNP_Val_Status

fields.description: DNA Repair Genes Role
fields.name: DNARepairGenes_Role

fields.description: Associated Drug Bank Names and IDs
fields.name: DrugBank

fields.description: Percent GC content
fields.name: GC_Content

fields.description: Transcript Name from GENCODE
fields.name: GENCODE_Transcript_Name

fields.description: Transcript Status from GENCODE
fields.name: GENCODE_Transcript_Status

fields.description: Transcript Type from GENCODE, for more information: https://www.gencodegenes.org/pages/biotypes.html
fields.name: GENCODE_Transcript_Type

fields.description: Gene type. eg protein_coding, lincRNA, etc
fields.name: Gene_Type

fields.description: GO Biological Process, for more information: http://geneontology.org/docs/ontology-documentation/
fields.name: GO_Biological_Process

fields.description: GO Cellular Component. For more information: http://geneontology.org/docs/ontology-documentation/
fields.name: GO_Cellular_Component

fields.description: GO Molecular Function, for more information: http://geneontology.org/docs/ontology-documentation/
fields.name: GO_Molecular_Function

fields.description: HGNC Accession Numbers
fields.name: HGNC_Accession_Numbers

fields.description: HGNC CCDS IDs
fields.name: HGNC_CCDS_IDs

fields.description: Ensembl ID
fields.name: HGNC_Ensembl_ID_Supplied_By_Ensembl

fields.description: HGNC ID
fields.name: HGNC_HGNC_ID

fields.description: HGNC Locus Group
fields.name: HGNC_Locus_Group

fields.description: HGNC Locus Type
fields.name: HGNC_Locus_Type

fields.description: OMIM ID
fields.name: HGNC_OMIM_ID_Supplied_By_NCBI

fields.description: RefSeq ID
fields.name: HGNC_RefSeq_Supplied_By_NCBI

fields.description: UCSC ID
fields.name: HGNC_UCSC_ID_Supplied_By_UCSC

fields.description: HUGO symbol for the gene (HUGO symbols are always in all caps). Unknown is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene
fields.name: Hugo_Symbol

fields.description: Primary data genotype. Matched normal sequencing allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases (cleared in somatic MAF)
fields.name: Normal_Seq_Allele1

fields.description: Matched normal sequencing allele 2
fields.name: Normal_Seq_Allele2

fields.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Matched normal genotyping (validation) for allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases (cleared in somatic MAF)
fields.name: Normal_Validation_Allele1

fields.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Matched normal genotyping (validation) for allele 2 (cleared in somatic MAF)
fields.name: Normal_Validation_Allele2

fields.description: Open Regulatory Annotation Database Id. Example: OREG0026204, OREG0023259
fields.name: OREGANNO_ID

fields.description: Reference allele per VCF specs, and its five flanking base pairs
fields.name: Ref_Context

fields.description: The plus strand reference allele at this position. Includes the deleted sequence for a deletion or - for an insertion
fields.name: Reference_Allele

fields.description: RefSeq Protein ID e.g. NP_000134.2
fields.name: Refseq_Prot_Id

fields.description: Secondary Variant Classification
fields.name: Secondary_Variant_Classification

fields.description: Instrument used to produce primary sequence data
fields.name: Sequencer

fields.description: Molecular assay type used to produce the analytes used for sequencing. Allowed values are a subset of the SRA 1.5 library_strategy field values. This subset matches those used at CGHub
fields.name: Sequence_Source

fields.description: SwissProt Accesssion ID
fields.name: SwissProt_Acc_Id

fields.description: SwissProt Entry ID
fields.name: SwissProt_Entry_Id

fields.description: Transcript Exon
fields.name: Transcript_Exon

fields.description: Transcript Position
fields.name: Transcript_Position

fields.description: DNA strand (1 or -1) on which the transcript/feature lies
fields.name: Transcript_Strand

fields.description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases
fields.name: Tumor_Seq_Allele1

fields.description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 2. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases
fields.name: Tumor_Seq_Allele2

fields.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Tumor genotyping (validation) for allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases
fields.name: Tumor_Validation_Allele1

fields.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Tumor genotyping (validation) for allele 2
fields.name: Tumor_Validation_Allele2

fields.description: UniProt AA position
fields.name: UniProt_AApos

fields.description: UniProt Region
fields.name: UniProt_Region

fields.description: The assay platforms used for the validation call
fields.name: Validation_Method
